definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation

sentences.english: Fully populated each Barge drive bay contains 96 drives.
sentences.chinese: 完全稀疏的每隻平底船開灣包括96個驅動器。

sentences.english: Dotted amongst the sparse trees were a dozen low mounds.
sentences.chinese: 在那些稀疏樹木間，有一些很矮的土堆以點狀分佈。

sentences.english: The matured larvae pupate on the back of leaves.
sentences.chinese: 幼蟲在葉背吐絲結稀疏的薄繭化蛹。

sentences.english: Secondly, the complexity of fully-connected kernel auto-associative memory models is reduced.
sentences.chinese: 對全互連的核自聯想記憶模型框架進行了稀疏化改造。

sentences.english: The third one will show you the aerosol optical inversion algorithm in sparse vegetation region.
sentences.chinese: 第三章介紹了稀疏植被區域氣溶膠光學厚度反演算法。

sentences.english: The collaborative filtering (CF) algorithms often suffer from data sparsity problem.
sentences.chinese: 評分矩陣數據稀疏問題嚴重影響協同過濾推薦性能。

sentences.english: The dialogue is not only sparse, but amusingly formal and awkward.
sentences.chinese: 對話不僅是稀疏，但可笑的正式和尷尬。

sentences.english: Ground moving target indicator(GMTI) using space based sparse array is attractive.
sentences.chinese: 天基稀疏陣實現地面運動目標指示具有很大吸引力。

sentences.english: The beautiful sparse shadows of the arching willows were like a picture etched on the lotus leaves .
sentences.chinese: 彎彎的楊柳的稀疏的倩影，象是畫在荷葉上。

sentences.english: Gaussian over lapped and clipped codebook is used in codebook search.
sentences.chinese: 在隨機碼本搜索中，採用高斯重疊稀疏碼本。

sentences.english: Market turnover remained low, coinciding with a reduction in open interest in futures.
sentences.chinese: 市場交投仍然稀疏，未平倉期貨合約亦見減少。

sentences.english: Studies on the microeconomics and pricing of bancassurance products are sparse.
sentences.chinese: 微不雅觀經濟學研究的銀行保險產物和價格的稀疏。

sentences.english: The first layer of white glue was mixed with water but just a little.
sentences.chinese: 先把白膠塗到上半部分的傘布上，要稀疏一點。

sentences.english: Research on Dilute Parti-cles Motion in Secondary Vortex Flow.
sentences.chinese: 旋渦二次流中稀疏顆粒的運動特性研究。

sentences.english: This is called a rarefaction and is represented by widely spaced dots .
sentences.chinese: 這個區域稱爲稀疏區，並用疏散的小點表示。

sentences.english: He was broad and tall, with ghost-pale skin and thinning white hair.
sentences.chinese: 他身板寬大，個子很高，面無血色，一頭稀疏的白髮。

definition: to thin out gradually/to become fainter and fainter
